column1: it's short, and that's been punished into the backward-square boundary. Stands tall, swivels and pulls square. Excellent start for Islamabad
back of a length on off stump, forced to go on the back foot and punched to long off. They walk across for the run
full on leg stump, tapped down the ground - past the non-striker's right - to mid on. Patel goes chasing after it
good length just outside off, backs away to the leg side and carves it to point. Can't find the gap, however
full on middle stump, straightens after pitching. Tapped back to the bowler off the front foot
tossed up on middle and leg, big stride forward and driven straight, but right into Patel's hands. Well stopped on the followthrough
good length just outside off, well punched, but off the back foot to cover point
good length on off stump, angling in, and nudged off his pads to midwicket
good length just outside off, pokes at it with the bat's open face. Runs it down to cover point
good length outside off, stands tall and slashes hard at it. Slapped past point, and races past the third-man fielder as well
good length on middle stump, defended off the back foot this time. Stopped by Sami on the follow through
full outside off, leans into the drive and crunches it to cover. Straight to the man at point, though. Denly says 'no' to the single
flighted on middle and leg, tries to drive after making room but Denly misses completely. Ronchi can't hold onto it either, and that's a stumping chance gone down!
full just on off stump, big stride forward and driven back to Patel
lifted! Offers the full face of the bat, and that races away to the long off boundary. Full on middle. and Denly was quick to judge the length. A couple of steps forward and smacked over Patel
full just outside off stump, walks down the wicket and drives to cover. Man there
good length on off stump, walks down the ground once again, and drives - inside out this time - to the off side. To the man at cover

shouts of 'catch it'! But that's all it is. Hit well enough to clear mid on - who displayed some hang time. Full on middle stump, and he can't get a full hold of it, but manages to slog this to the leg side. Comes off the bat's toe end
full on the fourth-stump line, prods forward and fends it back to Sami

tries to improvise, but doesn't go where he planned. Premeditates the leg-side ramp but Sami saw that. Bowls it full and wide outside off, but Manzoor goes across to the off side as well. Can't play it fine, though. Manages to ramp-sweep it to deep midwicket
full on off stump, tapped down the ground past Sami's right

excellent catch on the follow through! Who'd say he's 37, eh? Full on off and it's been smacked straight back to the bowler. Very less reaction time, but that's enough for Sami. Sticks both hands out to his right, and the ball stays put in his right hand. Sami's down on the floor, but the ball's safe with him
full just outside off, Babar takes a step down the wicket, and tapped back to the bowler

short on middle and leg, Babar makes room on the leg side, but Sami follows him. Tries to pull, but he's in no position to attempt that. Sliced off the bat's bottom half, and taken comfortably at mid off. Duminy won't put those down
full on off stump, no spin yet off the surface. Driven along the ground past cover to the man in the deep
full on middle stump, Morgan goes deep into his crease and flicked to deep midwicket for a walking single
good length on middle stump. Denly goes to the leg side and carves it past cover point to the man in the deep
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended to mid off
good length on leg stump, opens his stance and punches off the back foot to mid on. Diving effort from Duminy takes the pace off the ball
good length on middle and leg, punched back to the bowler. Samit runs to his left and collects
good length on leg stump, clipped off his pads to midwicket and Morgan wants the run. Can be close, but the fielder can't get the direct hit
full on off stump, no footwork from Denly as he tries to defend. Takes the inside edge and ricochets onto his pads. They take off for the single as the ball trickles down to short third man
good length on middle stump. Angling across Morgan this time. Chopped off the back foot to point. No run this time
full on off stump, slaps it past cover on this occasion. Early call for two, as the two infielders go chasing. Intercepted a few feet inside the boundary
back of a length outside leg. Slightly slower this time, and Morgan has all the time in the world. Pulled fine, and the ball races away to the deep backward-square boundary

close! Almost edged that to the keeper. Good length on leg stump and angling across Morgan. He tries to open the bat's face and run it down to third man, but can't connect. Karachi's run rate after the Powerplay: 4.83
full on off stump, crunches this drive to deep extra cover. Hit too well, so only a single
reverse swept! Full on middle stump, and Morgan changes his grip. Smacks it past the traditional point fielder
good length on middle stump, turned off his hips to the man in the deep
good length on middle stump. The ball holds up off the surface this time. Denly's forced to wait for it, before tapping it to cover
full on middle and leg, Morgan goes onto the back foot and turns it off his pads to the leg side
back of a length on middle stump, the batsman walks down the wicket and punched past the bowler's right
low full toss outside off, smothered with the spin to the leg side. Goes to the man at deep midwicket
reverse swept with perfection! Full on middle stump, and he takes a big stride forward to get to the pitch of the ball. His bat speed does the rest as the delivery goes to the deep point boundary
full on leg stump, driven down the ground to long on
gives it a rip this time. Full on off stump, and driven past Shadab to long off. They walk across for the run
the reverse sweep doesn't come off this time. It's the wrong'un from Shadab too. Full on off and going across Morgan
full just outside off stump. Prods forward and crunches this drive to long off

soft dismissal! Out first ball. Back of a length on leg stump, and Morgan punches this away from his body. Comes off the bat's top half, and pouched by midwicket. What a celebration from the bowler. Two fist pumps!
good length on middle stump, turned off his pads to the leg side for a quick single
full on off stump, punched off the back foot to mid off
good length on off stump, cut off the back foot to point. Says no to the single
back of a length on leg stump, turns it off his pads to deep midwicket. Only a single. Islamabad won't mind these!
good length just outside off, opens the bat's face and glances it to point
full on off stump, down on one knee and swept fine. That's the team fifty!
leading edge, but just short of Shadab! Full on middle stump, and turning away from the batsman. Tries to play towards mid on, but takes the edge
full on middle stump, driven down the ground to long on
good length on leg stump, turns into the batsman. Nudged off the pads to square leg
full on leg stump, down on one knee and attempts another sweep. Misses out, as the ball hits his front leg. Neither batsman nor keeper bother appealing

chance of a run out! But he's safe. Full on off stump, and tapped to off side. He's halfway down the wicket when the non-striker says no to the single. Shadab throws it in, but the batsman's slid in as well
stunning stroke! Couldn't have asked for a better delivery to swing through. Short and angling down leg, he swivelled back and helped it over fine leg.
length on middle stump, hint of inward movement, he plays outside the line and gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
just clears mid-off! Backed away to go over cover but the bowler banged it in, he was cramped for room but went through with this flat-batted hit.
gets this to nip away from length outside off, punched into the gap at cover for an easy single
looks to walk across and whip but the bowler tucks him for room, bowls a heavy ball. Defended towards point as they scamper a single
plays the short-arm jab, which he can't time. Hit straight to mid-on
flatter one on middle and leg, gets a faint tickle down leg, Ronchi gets a glove on it and deflects it to short fine leg
drifts in a full delivery on the pads, nurdled gently towards the man coming in from deep square. Excellent running
steps out to go over the top, the bowler shortens his length, so he dabs it back down the crease
makes room and slaps this short delivery to deep cover

drifts across a length ball to the left-hander, he rocks back and cuts towards the deep point region. Absolutely hammered that. Asif does well to dish in a dive full length to his right to cut that off
works this shortish delivery against the turn from off to deep midwicket
angles this down to third man for an easy single
full on off, drills this on the bounce to mid-off
beaten by the slower one that he looked to work towards the leg side. Went through with this pull way too early
slower and fuller on the stumps, mistimes it back to the bowler, who stops it with his boot
excellent yorker. Full, deadly straight and honing in towards the toes, Ingram somehow manages to squeeze this out
gets across the stumps and swipes this slower delivery towards deep square leg.
dropped at deep square leg. Tough, tough chance by Asif. This was swept powerfully from outside off, he did all the hard work in running across but just couldn't hold on
works this gently with the spin into the leg side
swing and a miss. This was the googly which he looked to hoick across the line but played too early
flatter one on the pads, hits the body and deflects into the leg side as he looks to wrist this
this is nicely tossed up, Denly steps out to go over cover but doesn't get to the pitch of it and ends up slicing it over the infield. Cover and point run back
slow turn from off stump, this is a gentle little dab into the off side for a quick single
angles in a length ball on the stumps, defended gently into the off side for a quick single
just eludes the deep cover fielder. This was a slower length ball, he backed away and slapped this but got more elevation than distance.
in his swinging arc, he makes a bit of room and belts this on the bounce to long-on

swings north, but the ball goes south. Lucky boundary! Short ball angling in, he stepped out to flat bat this over long-on but ended up getting a thick inside edge past the keeper and to the fine leg boundary
full toss on the pads, he walks across the stumps and whips this towards midwicket
banged in short, Ingram swivels back and swats this pull over the fine leg fence. Cleared this quite comfortably
slower length ball on middle, he was winding up to have a go, ends up pulling it on the bounce to deep square leg
full toss outside off, so much room and he belts this to deep cover. Had the free swing of the arms. Don't think he realised how well he hit this. Went all the way. Magnificent
walks across and pulls this length ball on off to deep square leg
ripper of a yorker on the pads, Denly is off balance as he looks to squeeze this to the leg side. Hits him flush on the boot! They squeeze in a leg bye
slower length ball outside off, he swats this straight to extra cover, can't get the single

wow, he's blasted this over long-on, and that has been deposited deep in the stands. Someone's caught it too! Length ball angling away, just what Ingram wants at this stage. Enough room for him to swing through cleanly. Picked the bones out of that. Magnificent
right into the blockhole on off stump, squeezed to long-on
looks to spear in a wide yorker, but this slips out of his hands. Way outside off, some exercise for the umpire
yorker-length outside off, he makes room and carves this towards deep point, back for the second quite comfortably
another high full toss that slips off his hand, turns out to be way outside off.
squeezes this yorker-length delivery back down the ground, the kind of delivery he was trying to bowl off the previous delivery.
first looks to walk across, then goes back to his original stance and swings this low full toss on off stump to long-off
drills this full delivery on off to wide long-off
backs away and swings this full toss on middle to long-off
slower and fuller delivery on the stumps, toe-ends this swing down to long-on
full and wide outside off, he's down on one knee as he drills this to sweeper cover
straight as an arrow. This has been launched over the sightscreen. Magnificent hit. Used the depth of the crease superbly. Stayed still, made a hint of room and teed off straight. Off the middle

how unfortunate is that. End of a lovely little innings though. This was full on off, he went deep into the crease to squeeze this out but in the process ended up nudging the stumps with his back foot.
squeezes this drive to the man at the edge of the ring at cover, Afridi off the mark

excellent improvisation, presence of mind. This is full outside off, Ingram waits and waits for it and then lends direction to this full toss to beat square third man. Lovely timing, lovely touch. Brings up his half-century too
yorker-length on off, squeezed to long-off. Afridi can't get under the length. Excellent bowling by the old pro
full on off, drills this straight to cover. Refuses the single
full toss outside off, he walks across the stumps and whips this to deep midwicket
backs away and drills this down to long-off
he's bowling yorkers on demand today. Can only squeeze this as far as extra cover
the yorker tails away late to beat his wild swing. Looked to fetch this from way outside off
wow, he's teeing off in some style here. This is full and angling away, he takes a step or two, goes back deep into the crease and belts this into the second tier at long-on
full toss and a whack! This has been walloped over deep point. Superb hand-eye coordination
full and straight on off stump, he backs away and squeezes this to mid-off
full toss outside off, he looks to back away and swing over cover but ends up slicing it towards deep point
he's top-edged the pull, swirls in the air for a long, long time but lands wide of the fine leg fielder. This was definitely a catching opportunity
goes full and straight again, he backs away and drills this down to long-on

sent away once more! Goes back of a length this time, and Ronchi uses his bottom hand to shovel this pull over the infield. Drops beyond the infielder and takes a couple of bounces into the mid-wicket boundary
full on off stump, but it's the change up this time. Tries to open the bat's face and run it down to third man, but doesn't make contact with the bat
good length on middle stump, angling across the batsman, and runs it down to third man
good length outside leg stump, turned off his pads to fine leg
flicked, but oh so nonchalantly! Good length on leg stump, and whipped off his pads! Over square leg and races into the backward square boundary. Big first over!
good length on middle stump, punched off the back foot to Usman
good length on middle stump, angling across Farhan, and punched to mid off
good length on middle stump, punches towards cover once again, but takes the outside edge. Trickles down to third man
full on off stump. Ronchi's forced to go on the back foot, but comfortably tapped to mid off
good length on off stump, tries to lift it over cover, but takes a thick outside edge. Going fine, but intercepted by the fielder at third man. Quick work from the outfielder

dropped at third man! Tymal Mills the man there. Short on off stump, and the batsman tries a big pull. Top edged, and soaring over the keeper. Mills has a lot of ground to cover, and even takes the catch, but the ball pops out as he falls over. Almost went for a six, but almost out as well
full and wide outside off. Ronchi goes chasing at it, but can't connect with the drive. Goes past his outside edge but inside the wide-line
beats mid off! Full on off stump, and Ronchi check-drives that past the non-striker's left. Hit uppishly, but mid off never stood a chance. Powerfully struck on this occasion
short on leg stump. Forces the batsman to duck under the line of the ball
slogged over cow corner! Slower ball on off stump, Ronchi spots the length in a flash, and muscled towards the leg side. Huge hit, into the second tier
short and wide this time. Ronchi enjoys the width and slashes hard at it. Played away from his body and hit over point. They'll get a couple more

muscled over mid off! No stopping Ronchi. Another big over from the New Zealander. Overpitched on middle and off, but Ronchi's in another mood. Big stride forward and driven with the bat's full follow through. One bounce and into the long-off boundary
full on middle stump, angling into the right hander, defended down the ground to mid on
drifts inwards, but lands full on off stump. Ronchi takes one step forward, and caresses this drive past cover. Textbook stuff

over long on! He's wasting no time! Full on off stump, and Ronchi opens his stance to get some extra room. With the front foot out of the way, Ronchi can swing that bat completely, and sends it over the boundary with disdain
good length on middle stump, goes deep and muscles this towards the leg side. Finds the gap once again, and races away to the midwicket boundary

full on off stump, but angles sharply inwards. Zips after hitting the surface, and Ronchi's been trapped in front of his stumps. Big appeal for lbw, but the umpire isn't interested. Probably would've gone down leg
full on off stump, but Farhan's done being spectator form the other end. Big wind up from the batsman, and flat bats it over Usman! Off the bat's sweeeet spot, and into the long-off boundary. Oof
good length on middle stump, the ball angles inwards, and punched back to the bowler
Fastest fifty of HBL PSL! Gets there in 19 balls. Ridiculous hitting. Breaks Umar Akmal's 22-ball record. Short on middle stump, and it's been flicked off his hips! Over deep backward square
full toss wide outside off, down on one knee and slapped over third man! The fielder there is inside the circle, and the slash has enough behind it to go all beyond the boundary. Whoa

It's all happening, dropped! Full and slow on off stump, and Ronchi's drive comes off the bat's toe end. In the air for ages, and Usman called for the catch as well, but drops it with the ball swirling down
back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to cover. A rare dot

third time lucky! Dropped once again. Full on off stump, and Ronchi flicks this over square leg. Once again in the air for ages, but the man in the deep - Khurram Manzoor - drops it once again. Ronchi's making merry
back of a length on leg stump, swivels and pulls over midwicket. Wide long on and midwicket go chasing after it, and parried back just inside the boundary rope
good length on middle stump, angling across the batsman. Opens his bat's face and punches it behind square. Goes down to the backward-point boundary
good length on middle stump, stays on the back foot and fended to cover. Another rare dot off Ronchi
full outside off, full follow through off the bat as Ronchi drives to mid off. He's now PSL 2018's highest run-scorer
back of a length on leg stump, clipped off his pads to midwicket for a quick run. Islamabad score 75 off the Powerplay
good length outside off, but jags away after pitching. Tries to drive over cover, but played down the wrong line. Through to the keeper
short outside off, but he's going for the pull anyway. Off the bat's toe end, and that perhaps saves Farhan. Drops between wide long on and deep midwicket
back of a length on middle stump, tries to swipe it towards the leg side, but too high. Goes over the batsman's helmet

textbook stuff! Stand and deliver. Length ball on off stump, Farhan takes two steps forward and lifts this over Mills' head! Falls just next to the sightscreen. Proper follow through from the youngster as well. Delightful
slower ball, full and wide outside leg. Tries to clip it off his pads but misses
slower ball on a good length. Pitches on leg stump, and defended back to the bowler
too full on off stump, and just the length for Farhan to get his bat under. The ball's angling away from him, and that's what allows him to free his arms. Smacked over long on!
Taken at cover! Full and wide outside off, and Farhan goes chasing after it. Tries to carve this over cover, but slices that shot. Finally a catch that's held on
full on off stump, the ball's drifting into Ronchi, and it's been pushed down the ground to long on
good length on off stump, goes onto the back foot, and flicked to deep midwicket
good length outside off, spins further away. Cut off the back foot to deep backward point
full on leg stump and goes straight through. Sharp take from the keeper but the umpire calls it as extras
full just outside off, but spinning further away. Hales pokes at it and glances it to point
good length just outside off, it's the one that goes straight through and Ronchi flat-bats it. Comes off the bat's toe end and chipped over Afridi. Falls way in front of long on

dropped! This time by the man who took the catch seven balls ago. Full outside off and Ronchi drives hard. Hit to Afridi's left, but the ball bursts through the bowler's hands. Afridi's having a look at his palm. That must've hurt!
good length just outside off, and that's been comfortably pulled off the back foot! Colin Ingram's diving effort at deep midwicket is just not good enough
width offered outside off, and Ronchi has crunched this cut past point! Just went a couple of steps onto the back foot, and slaps it past the infield. Third man has no chance either
hat-trick of fours! Full and wide outside off. Slightly overpitched, and driven past cover. Off the bat's toe end, but everything's flying off Ronchi's bat. Into the extra-cover boundary
good length just outside off, pokes at it and runs it down to deep backward point
back of a length outside off, chops it down to third man, but oh dear! Amir, at third man, fluffs this. The ball goes between his fingers and into the boundary
back of a length just outside off, the ball's angling in, and Hales comfortably turns it to square leg for a walking single
good length on off stump, but turns away from Hales. Flicked off his pads to midwicket for a quick run
full outside off, down on one knee to try and sweep, but top edged past the keeper's right to third man. Chase for the infielder
good length on leg stump, turned off his pads to deep backward square
full on middle stump, drifts into his pads. Nudges it to midwicket off the back foot
good length on off stump once again, punched off the back foot to long on for a walking single. Afridi is struggling.

half tracker outside off, and that's way too easy for Luke Ronchi! Steps backward to use the full depth of the crease, and pulled to cow corner. That's the flattest pull shot I've ever seen. Falls just inside the boundary. Islamabad on 124 after 10 overs

back of a length outside off, angling into Hales and the batsman pulls along the carpet this time! Even the otherwise-reliable Usman isn't being spared tonight. Deep midwicket's sliding effort ain't good enough
full on off stump, defended off the front foot to cover. Played into the gap, and they scamper across for the single
good length on middle stump, turned off his pads - using his wrists - to square leg. It was the change up from Usman this time, but Ronchi's seeing the ball like a watermelon

finally, a catch taken! Short and wide outside off, but Hales pulls. Takes the top edge and goes almost for a six, but just short in the end. Mills slides across the ground on his knees to complete the catch
good length on middle stump, but it's the cutter. Jags away from the surface after pitching and the batsman can't connect with his leg-side drag. Through to the keeper
bunted over long on! Full on middle and all Ronchi needs to do is meet the ball on the full. It's that full followthrough off the bat that generates the bat speed. Smacked over the bowler's head
good length on off stump, and angling across the batsman. Tries to lift this inside out over cover, but can't get bat to ball
full on off stump. Tries to drive but takes the bat's toe end. It's racing away off the surface and third man's sliding effort in the deep can't stop it either
short on leg stump, not much bounce off the surface, and Patel drags his pull along the ground to fine leg
full on middle stump, driven straight past the non-striker to long off for a walking single
full on middle stump, goes across his body, and punched off the back foot to deep extra cover
moves on to 94! Back of a length outside off, but Ronchi's prepared for that pull. Stands tall and smacks this past midwicket. The man in the deep is just a spectator
good length on middle stump, tries to defend off the back foot but the ball takes a thick outside edge. Flies past the keeper's right for four more. Patel's not happy that it's gone for four
full and wide outside off, Patel tries to slap it towards point, but can't connect
back of a length outside off, pokes at it and gets another thick outside edge. Flies past point, and that's the winning runs!
